Name: The Devil's Chosen
About the game: In The Devil's Chosen, classic action, tense exploration, puzzle-solving gameplay and the worst demons you can imagine in a classic card world style. Players team up with an unnamed character, because that's not important, and his pathetic attempt to have a girlfriend, which he sometimes doesn't understand, how she always gets him into trouble, today was no different, the fate of hell it's in your hands! A whole new perspective – Have you ever seen anything like this? All handmade. Cards? Terribly realistic visuals – The sickest monsters ever seen by mammals. Face the grotesque hordes – Demons will run after you as they react in real time, taking instant visible damage, making every bullet count. Iconic Gameplay – Engage in frantic combat with enemies, explore menacing dark corridors, solve puzzles to access areas and collect and use items discovered around the environment in a constant and terrifying fight for survival. See your favorite characters under your survivors collection - Today you try to be the hero, and help the gang! Take the role of the Demon Destroyer - Find new weapons, places, enemies, friends, and a whole lot of ugly stuff. Time to get ready and *%@&* everything!!!!!!!
